forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.
